source_objects.description: Become a master strategist with courses on the following: business strategy, performance innovation, marketing strategy, customer loyalty and more.
source_objects.title: Business Strategy

items.title: Marketing Guide: Learn Marketing Strategies & Techniques
items.headline: Marketing Guide: Learn fundamental marketing concepts, marketing strategies, marketing tools, and marketing techniques.
objectives_summary: Understand what is marketing
Learn the concepts of marketing
Understand markets and marketers

items.title: Don't Launch your Survey Yet! 4 Traps to Remove First
items.headline: Easily avoid the 4 traps that dis-engage your respondents and yield meaningless survey results.
objectives_summary: Avoid the 4 major traps that are built-in to SurveyMonkey, Qualtrics, Survey Gizmo, and other survey-creation tools
Dramatically increase response rates on your surveys
Learn survey hacks that will give you so much more out of your survey results

items.title: Hotel Management - Revenue Management for Beginners | Basics
items.headline: Hotel Revenue Management | Concepts of Yield Management |  Market Segmentation | Pricing Strategies | Tools | Indices |
objectives_summary: Understand the basics of Revenue Management.
Learn about the various indexes and matrices used in evaluating perfromance
Gain more insights into the elements of Revenue Management like tools and support strategies

items.title: Design Thinking - A hands-on course on Innovation
items.headline: Learn how to introduce products that WOW your customers
objectives_summary: Fully understand and lead Design Thinking programs at their workplace

items.title: Fundamentals of Hospitality Revenue Management

visible_instructors.name: Hotel Management School
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Hotel Management courses for career development
visible_instructors.display_name: Hotel Management School Your learning Partner
visible_instructors.title: Hotel Management School Your learning Partner

items.headline: fundamental of process, reports and data requirements in Revenue Management, pricing, SWOT Analysis, demand forecasting
objectives_summary: Learn Revenue Management Fundamentals
Pricing Pillar
Competition Analysis (SWOT Analysis)

items.title: Digital Strategy Mastery : Learn Success Secrets from Amazon
items.headline: If you want to be a successful leader in digital transformation or a business strategy consultant, take this course.
objectives_summary: Digital strategy success principles at the MBA level
Practical application of strategic concepts in the context of a real-life online company : Amazon
How to use the takeaways from the course to build your own successful digital strategy, or help your consulting clients to succeed in theirs

items.title: 7 Steps to a Perfectly Written Business Plan

visible_instructors.name: Robin
visible_instructors.job_title: Best-Selling Instructors in Digital Marketing & Business
visible_instructors.title: Robin & Jesper

items.headline: The Ultimate Guide For Aspiring Entrepreneurs to Writing Their Business Plan in 7 Simple & Effective Steps For Success
objectives_summary: To Write Their Business Description
To Write Their Market Analysis
To Write Their Organization & Management Strategy

items.title: Business Plan: For Startup & Small Business Success Today!
items.headline: Business Planning success can be easily achieved by using this Comprehensive Business Plan & Cashflow Forecast template.
objectives_summary: Gain the confidence you need to write your business plan!
By the end of this course you should have a 10-30 page business plan.
You will know exactly how much you need for your business

items.title: OKR: Methodology and Application
items.headline: Learn all the basics and advanced topics of OKR (Objectives and Key Results) and how to run it in an organization.
objectives_summary: All concepts of the OKR methodology with real examples from tech companies.
How to define objectives to guide teams' initiatives.
How to define key results that generate value to the business and avoid perverse incentives.

items.title: Business Portfolio | Environmental Analysis | Strategies
items.headline: Understanding Business Portfolio and Portfolio Analysis along with Environmental Analysis & Growth Strategies
objectives_summary: In-depth understanding of Business Portfolio
Clear understanding of Portfolio Analysis
Understanding of how organisations analyse their environment

visible_instructors.job_title: Head of Product Management at Virtual Identity
visible_instructors.title: David Pereira

items.headline: Learn what it takes to thrive in your journey
objectives_summary: How to excel as a Product Owner
The main skills of a strong Product Owner
Which are the main activities of a Product Owner on the daily business

items.title: Business Impact Analysis

visible_instructors.name: The Art Of
visible_instructors.job_title: Quality education for Career Driven IT Professionals
visible_instructors.title: The Art Of Service

items.headline: An introductory course about understanding Business Impact Analysis and its importance in every business organization.
objectives_summary: Be introduced to Crisis Management and Business Continuity Planning.
Be aware of the importance and benefits of BIA.
To know the process, methods and elements of BIA.

items.title: 2021 Guide to Monetizing Your Website or Blog
items.headline: Discover the wide variety of monetization strategies available for your website
objectives_summary: Various options for monetizing a website or blog
How to identify the right monetizaton strategy for your website
The estimated income, requirements to start, and pros and cons of each monetization strategy

items.title: Product Management & Marketing: Positioning
items.headline: Learn how to master your "positioning statement" in just 90 minutes.
objectives_summary: Understand how and why positioning statements drive better, more relevant and clear communications
Learn how to create your own positioning statements
Practice evaluating positioning statements

items.title: Price and Pricing Strategies
items.headline: A Step Towards Generating Revenues and Earning Profit
objectives_summary: Definitions of price
Types of price
Setting effective price

items.title: Value Innovation Process® Success Stories

visible_instructors.job_title: CEO, Author, Value Innovation Black Belt
visible_instructors.name: Dick
visible_instructors.title: Dick Lee Ph. D.

items.headline: See how companies drove business growth through innovation.  New Products & Services that exceeded their customers' need
objectives_summary: 1. Show that when you follow the Value Innovation Process you will deliver exceptional value to the Most Important Customer in the Value Chain (all six examples)
2. Demonstrate the importance of following each step of the Value Innovation Process
3. Underscore that you must identify the Most Important Customer correctly (The FoldedPak and Nautilus examples)
